name: Moon
short_info: Earths only natural satellite

name: Phobos
short_info: One of the two moons of Mars

name: Deimos
short_info: The smaller and outermost moon of Mars

name: Io
short_info: The innermost and fourth-largest moon of Jupiter

name: Europa
short_info: One of Jupiters Galilean moons known for its ice-covered surface

name: Ganymede
short_info: The largest moon in our solar system - a moon of Jupiter

name: Callisto
short_info: The third-largest moon of Jupiter

name: Titan
short_info: The largest moon of Saturn known for its thick atmosphere

name: Enceladus
short_info: One of Saturns moons with an icy surface and geysers of water vapor

name: Mimas
short_info: The smallest and innermost of Saturns major moons

name: Triton
short_info: The largest moon of Neptune known for its retrograde orbit

name: Charon
short_info: Plutos largest moon - part of the Pluto-Charon binary system

name: Luna
short_info: The Latin name for Earths Moon

name: Phoebe
short_info: An irregular moon of Saturn known for its retrograde orbit

name: Rhea
short_info: The second-largest moon of Saturn

name: Dione
short_info: A moon of Saturn known for its bright icy surface

name: Hyperion
short_info: An irregular moon of Saturn with an irregular shape

name: Ariel
short_info: One of Uranuss five major moons

name: Titania
short_info: The largest moon of Uranus

name: Miranda
short_info: The smallest and innermost of Uranuss five major moons
